wikipedia_page.main: Arthur Hughes  (July 1884 – 1970) was a Welsh international footballer. He was part of the Wales national football team, playing one match on 23  February 1907 against Ireland. At club level, he played for Chirk.

*Arthur Hughes (Scottish footballer) (1927–2015), Scottish footballer for Grimsby Town and Gillingham
